headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Beach Bum Content Update Available Now
content:
This free update, available now, provides a huge variety of new beach and leisure focused content. Youâ€™ll get:

- Four new amazing beach fun vehicles, including the new Speeder Boat.
- All new beach-inspired customization options including striped board shorts, neon short shorts, inane tribal tattoos and shaggy hair.
- Two new but not remotely relaxing weapons.
- 30 new Jobs, in case you get bored of lying around.
